description: TypedLocalObjectReference allows to reference typed object inside the same namespace.

apiGroup.description: APIGroup is the group for the resource being referenced. If APIGroup is empty, the specified Kind must be in the core API group. For any other third-party types, setting APIGroup is required. It must be a DNS subdomain.

kind.description: Kind is the type of resource being referenced. It must be a path segment name.

name.description: Name is the name of resource being referenced. It must be a path segment name.
